name: Gaia (itch) (Koldblade)
description:
Gaia is a 3D RTS with elements of Management and

Survival that answers the question that no other RTS has

answered to yet: “What If nature Fights back?”.

Become Gaia, a physical manifestation of mother nature and help

Nature repel the advances of Mankind’s ever-expanding greed for

more of your land and its resources.
